title: Comcast, Disney Battle for Fox, Consumers Hit The Road, Small Caps Need Breather
itunes:title: Comcast, Disney Battle for Fox, Consumers Hit The Road, Small Caps Need Breather
description:
Carol is joined by Bloomberg Senior Editor Bob Ivry and they speak to Tara Lachapelle, Bloomberg Opinion M&A Columnist, and Geetha Ranganathan, Bloomberg Intelligence Media Analyst, on Comcast and Disney's competing bids for Fox assets. Sarah Quinlan Senior VP at MasterCard Advisors, discusses retail sales numbers and summer travel data. Kevin Kelly, Bloomberg Intelligence Strategy Analyst, explains why small caps may be a little overheated in the short run.Sarah Frier,Bloomberg News Technology Reporter, talks about Facebook choosing academic collaborations in line with their business goals. And we Drive to the Close with Brad McMillan, CIO at Commonwealth Financial Network.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
